intro: Sporadanthus strictus, commonly known as the narrowleaf sporadanthus, is a flowering plant native to southern Africa. It belongs to the family Aizoaceae, also known as the ice plant family, and is characterized by its succulent leaves and vibrant flowers. Sporadanthus strictus is well adapted to drought, with thick, fleshy leaves that store water and reduce transpiration.
